name: AFGWallAttachmentHologram
comment: Hologram for wall attachments, like wall mounts for conveyors and power.

properties.name: mIsRotationAllowed
properties.comment: Are you allowed to rotate this attachment on the walls surface.

properties.name: mRotationStep
properties.comment: The rotation step for when rotating, if 0 then use the default granularity.

properties.name: mSnapOffset
properties.comment: Snapping offset of this attachment on the walls surface.
